entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:38 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:38 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
